title: MAHAGENCO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Junior Fire Officer Posts
description: The Maharashtra State Power Generation Company (MAHAGENCO) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Junior Fire Officers, Pharmacist, and Fireman Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th, 12th, Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, Diploma, and D. Pharm can apply for the MAHAGENCO Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mod...
